readFile(String) - Method in class testing.LoadmapTest
 
refresh() - Method in class controller.Controller
After successfully game components by loadGame function, alert all observers in the MapUI for the current game state
reinforceArmy(Country, int) - Method in class entities.GamePlay
From player command: reinforce country number During reinforcement phase, player assigns the input amount of army to target country
reinforceCountry() - Method in class testing.ReinforceTest
 
ReinforceTest - Class in testing
Test operations on the Reinforcement phase A game save file junit_reinforce.save was pre-made with the following relevant data: Players a,b,c all have randomly placed armies on the map on the startup phase It is currently player a's turn Player a has 4 armies to place Japan is assigned to Player a with army count 3 Siam is assigned to Player b with army count 3 Ural is assigned to Player b with army count 2 China is assigned to Player c with army count 1
ReinforceTest() - Constructor for class testing.ReinforceTest
 
removeArmy(int) - Method in class entities.Country

removeContinent(Continent) - Method in class entities.Player
Removes continent under Player's ownedContinent list when player has lost control of full ownership of the Continent

reSetCount() - Method in class ui.labels.CardView

reSetOwner() - Method in class entities.GamePlay
Reset the owner for the defending country to the current owner after a successful conquer
rewardArmy(int) - Method in class entities.Player
Reward a specified amount of army to place during recruitment phase
rewardInitialArmy() - Method in class entities.Player

run() - Method in class ui.MapUI
Relays user input to the controller to process and act on the game play Error Dialog will pop up if the user command is invalid
